meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Michele Liguori Julie Harris Chuck Ladd Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4409.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Michele Liguori, an applications engineer and technical trainer from Maynard, Massachusetts
Julie Harris, a news librarian from Winston-Salem, North Carolina
Chuck Ladd, a project manager from Raleigh, North Carolina (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,400)

tr.td: FLIGHTLESS BIRDS
TRACK & FIELD
WHO WAS THE PREZ WHEN...
BAR HOPPING
15 MINUTES OF FAME
WORD "UP"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Nearly half of the height of this largest living bird is neck')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Nearly half of the height of this largest living bird is neck
